headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Index Treads Water in First Post-Christmas Session
summary: The S&P 500 slid less than 0.1% on Thursday, Dec. 26, 2024, as the market rally heading into Christmas lost steam on the first trading day after the holiday.
